## Conductor interface

Base interface of a Tryorama conductor. Both [LocalConductor](./tryorama.localconductor.md) and [TryCpConductor](./tryorama.trycpconductor.md) implement this interface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Conductor 
```
